com.aurel.track.admin.customize.treeConfig

Interface ConfigItemFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FieldConfigItemFacade, MailTemplateConfigFacade, ScreenConfigItemFacade

    public interface ConfigItemFacade
    A facade to DAO for ConfigItem and some business logic
